projects.title: Accessible Design System
projects.shortDescription: Production-ready design system emphasizing accessibility, theming, and developer workflows with comprehensive WCAG compliance
projects.challenge: Creating a comprehensive design system that maintains WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all components while providing flexible theming capabilities and seamless developer experience for large-scale applications.
projects.solution: Built a modular design system using React and TypeScript with Storybook for component documentation. Implemented automated accessibility testing with eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y, established design token workflows, and created comprehensive guidelines for developers to maintain accessibility standards.

metrics.label: WCAG Compliance
metrics.description: All components meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards

metrics.label: Development Time
metrics.description: Reduced time to build accessible features

screenshots.alt: Design system component library in Storybook
screenshots.caption: Component library with live examples and accessibility documentation

screenshots.alt: Dark and light theme demonstration
screenshots.caption: Flexible theming system supporting multiple color schemes

projects.title: AI Code Review Assistant
projects.shortDescription: Intelligent code review platform powered by AI, featuring real-time analysis, automated suggestions, and collaborative workflows for development teams
projects.challenge: Building an AI-powered code review system that can analyze code quality, security vulnerabilities, and provide intelligent suggestions while handling real-time collaboration for distributed development teams.
projects.solution: Developed a full-stack application using Next.js with AI integration through AWS services. Implemented real-time code analysis with Socket.io, created a comprehensive review dashboard with Radix UI components, and built an intelligent suggestion engine that learns from team coding patterns.

metrics.label: Review Time Saved
metrics.description: Average time reduction in code reviews

screenshots.alt: AI code review dashboard with suggestions
screenshots.caption: Intelligent dashboard showing automated suggestions and code quality metrics

screenshots.alt: Real-time collaborative code review session
screenshots.caption: Live collaborative reviews with AI-powered insights and team discussions

projects.title: Conversion-Optimized Landing Page Suite
projects.shortDescription: Conversion-optimized landing page suite with comprehensive A/B testing, analytics integration, and performance monitoring for maximum user engagement
projects.challenge: Creating a high-converting landing page system that maximizes user engagement through data-driven optimization, A/B testing, and comprehensive performance monitoring across multiple campaign variants.
projects.solution: Built a modular landing page suite using React and TypeScript with Vite for optimal performance. Implemented comprehensive A/B testing framework, integrated advanced analytics, created responsive designs with Tailwind CSS, and added smooth animations with Framer Motion. Used Playwright for E2E testing and Vitest for unit testing.

screenshots.alt: Multiple landing page variants showing A/B test results
screenshots.caption: Different landing page variants optimized for various user segments

screenshots.alt: Analytics dashboard showing conversion metrics
screenshots.caption: Real-time analytics dashboard tracking conversion rates and user behavior

projects.title: KL-CRM: Local-First Customer Relationship Management
projects.shortDescription: A comprehensive CRM system built with Python, DuckDB, and Streamlit for local-first data management
projects.challenge: Building a local-first CRM that processes Excel/CSV data, normalizes it into a relational schema, provides AI-driven contact enrichment, and serves interactive dashboards - all while maintaining data privacy and working entirely offline.
projects.solution: Developed a modular architecture using DuckDB for local data storage, Streamlit for the web interface, and integrated AI enrichment via pluggable adapters. Implemented comprehensive data governance with immutable snapshots and audit logging.

screenshots.alt: CRM Dashboard showing sales pipeline analytics
screenshots.caption: Interactive dashboard with sales KPIs and conversion metrics

screenshots.alt: Data import interface with Excel file processing
screenshots.caption: Excel/CSV import with automatic schema detection

screenshots.alt: Contact enrichment results with AI-generated insights
screenshots.caption: AI-powered contact enrichment with mock adapter

projects.title: KL Recycling Mobile App
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform Flutter application for comprehensive recycling management with Firebase backend
projects.challenge: Developing a comprehensive recycling management app that works across mobile platforms, integrates with Firebase for data synchronization, handles camera functionality for material identification, and provides offline capabilities for field operations.
projects.solution: Built a cross-platform Flutter app with Firebase backend integration, implementing camera functionality for material scanning, offline data synchronization, push notifications, and comprehensive state management using Provider pattern.

metrics.label: Platform Support
metrics.description: Android, iOS, Web, Windows, macOS, Linux

screenshots.alt: Mobile app home screen with collection tracking
screenshots.caption: Main dashboard showing active collections and quick actions

screenshots.alt: Camera interface for material identification
screenshots.caption: AI-powered camera for automatic material recognition

screenshots.alt: Analytics dashboard with recycling metrics
screenshots.caption: Comprehensive analytics and reporting features

projects.title: K&L Recycling Services Website
projects.shortDescription: Professional recycling services website with WCAG AA accessibility, PWA features, and comprehensive service information
projects.challenge: Creating an accessible, SEO-optimized website for a family-owned recycling business that showcases their services, builds trust with customers, and provides an excellent user experience across all devices while meeting WCAG AA accessibility standards.
projects.solution: Developed a modern, responsive website with progressive web app capabilities, comprehensive accessibility features, structured data markup, and integrated service showcases with testimonials and contact forms.

metrics.label: Page Load Speed
metrics.description: Average page load time on mobile

screenshots.alt: Homepage showcasing recycling services and company information
screenshots.caption: Clean, professional homepage with service overview

screenshots.caption: Comprehensive services section with pricing and features

screenshots.alt: Customer testimonials and reviews section
screenshots.caption: Social proof section with verified customer testimonials

projects.title: Sales Outreach Admin Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive sales outreach admin dashboard with real-time analytics, campaign management, and team performance tracking
projects.challenge: Building a comprehensive sales dashboard that provides real-time insights into outreach campaigns, team performance metrics, and campaign effectiveness while maintaining excellent user experience and data visualization.
projects.solution: Developed a responsive React dashboard using TypeScript and Material-UI for the interface. Implemented real-time data visualization with Recharts, created campaign management workflows, and built comprehensive analytics features with React Router for navigation. Used Axios for API communication and date-fns for date handling.

metrics.label: Response Rate
metrics.description: Average email response rate across campaigns

screenshots.alt: Main dashboard showing campaign analytics and metrics
screenshots.caption: Real-time dashboard displaying campaign performance and team metrics

screenshots.alt: Campaign management interface
screenshots.caption: Comprehensive campaign creation and management interface

projects.title: Interactive Messaging Playground
projects.shortDescription: A real-time messaging application with interactive features and modern UI
projects.challenge: Building a scalable real-time messaging system that handles thousands of concurrent users while maintaining low latency and providing rich interactive features.
projects.solution: Implemented WebSocket connections with Socket.io, optimized database queries, and used React for efficient UI updates. Added features like typing indicators, message reactions, and file sharing.

screenshots.alt: Main chat interface showing message threads
screenshots.caption: The main chat interface with message threads and user list

screenshots.alt: Mobile responsive design
screenshots.caption: Responsive design working on mobile devices

projects.title: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
projects.shortDescription: Intelligent recipe generation application powered by Google Gemini AI, featuring personalized meal suggestions, nutritional analysis, and Firebase integration
projects.challenge: Creating an intelligent recipe generation system that can understand user preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients to provide personalized recipe suggestions with proper nutritional information.
projects.solution: Built a modern web application using React and TypeScript with Vite for optimal performance. Integrated Google Gemini AI for intelligent recipe generation based on user inputs, implemented Firebase for user authentication and data storage, and created an intuitive interface for recipe browsing and management.

metrics.label: Generation Time
metrics.description: Average time to generate personalized recipes

screenshots.alt: AI recipe generator main interface
screenshots.caption: User-friendly interface for generating personalized recipes with AI

screenshots.alt: Generated recipe with nutritional information
screenshots.caption: Detailed recipe view with ingredients, instructions, and nutritional data
